entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:14 PM CDT Friday 28 April 2023
